The original claim was made in a blog po: blogspot.com, which is no longer available online. However, the headline and the first two paragraphs of the blog post were shared in a screenshot on Facebook.
The claim refers to Arief Budiman: the head of Indonesia's general elections commission (KPU), who allegedly made comments about China lending money to fix ballot boxes.
The misleading blog post is almost ident: com, with the only differences being the headline and the addition of the quote about China lending money. The quote is not present in any of Budiman's comments to Suara.com or other Indonesian media outlets.
